Sing Together 6 (Any number of your or your teammates' characters with total cost 6 or more may {E} to sing this song for free.)
Each opponent loses 2 lore. You gain 2 lore.
4.flavor_text:
Give me a career
As a buccaneer

4.name: Be King Undisputed
4.text:
(A character with cost 4 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Each opponent chooses and banishes one of their characters.
4.flavor_text: Respected, saluted

4.name: Brawl
4.text: Banish chosen character with 2 {S} or less.
4.flavor_text: There are two ways to leave the Snuggly Duckling — the door or the window.

4.name: Imperial Proclamation
4.text: CALL TO THE FRONT Whenever one of your characters challenges another character, you pay 1 {I} less for the next character you play this turn.
4.flavor_text:
"By order of the Emperor, one man from every family must serve in the Imperial Army."
—Chi Fu

4.name: Medallion Weights
4.text: DISCIPLINE AND STRENGTH {E}, 2 {I} — Chosen character gets +2 {S} this turn. Whenever they challenge another character this turn, you may draw a card.

4.name: The Plank
4.text:
WALK! 2 {I}, Banish this item – Choose one:
• Banish chosen Hero character.
• Ready chosen Villain character. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.
4.flavor_text: It's a once-in-a-lifetime view.

4.name: Vitalisphere
4.text: EXTRACT OF RUBY 1 {I}, Banish this item — Chosen character gains Rush and gets +2 {S} this turn. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)

4.name: Snuggly Duckling
4.text: ROUTINE RUCKUS Whenever a character with 3 {S} or more challenges another character while here, gain 1 lore. If the challenging character has 6 {S} or more, gain 3 lore instead.

4.name: Training Grounds
4.text: STRENGTH OF MIND 1 {I} — Chosen character here gets +1 {S} this turn.

4.name: Anna
4.text: I WAS BORN READY If you have another Hero character in play, this character gets +1 {L}.
4.flavor_text: After talking to Olaf, Anna marched into the unexpected storm to save Kristoff.

4.name: Anna
4.text: LET ME HELP YOU Whenever this character quests, your other Hero characters get +1 {L} this turn.
4.flavor_text: Make sure you know what's truly important and be willing to fight for it.

4.name: Ariel
4.text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
THE GIRL WHO HAS EVERYTHING While you have more items in play than each opponent, this character gets +2 {L}.

4.name: Aurora
4.text:
Shift 2 (You may pay 2 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Aurora.)
PRESERVER Opponents can't choose your items for abilities or effects.
ROYAL INVENTORY {E} one of your items — Look at the top card of your deck and put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.

4.name: Aurora
4.text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
4.flavor_text: Her music fills the Illuminary's gardens with joy and light.

4.name: Dang Hu
4.text: YOU BETTER TALK FAST Your other Villain characters gain Support. (Whenever they quest, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
4.flavor_text: You can find villainy in the most unexpected places.

4.name: Fa Li
4.flavor_text: When far from home, Mulan often thinks of her calming presence.

4.name: Flounder
4.text:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
I'M NOT A GUPPY If you have a character named Ariel in play, you pay 1 {I} less to play this character.
4.flavor_text: "Ariel, Ariel! You won't believe what I found!"

4.name: Hades
4.flavor_text: "On this cute little plot Ursula tentacles are sold a mile away. That sneaky sea witch… Wait! I can use this thing. While you keep those hateful Illumineers busy, I can carry out my plan."

4.name: Hans
4.text: ROYAL SCHEMES When you play this character, if a Princess or Queen character is in play, gain 1 lore.
4.flavor_text: Hans was confident he could bring Anna to Ursula-all he needed was something of Kristoff's to lure her in.

4.name: Iduna
4.text: ENDURING LOVE When this character is banished, you may put this card into your inkwell facedown and exerted.
4.flavor_text:
"Come my darling, homeward bound
When all is lost, then all is found."

4.name: John Silver
4.flavor_text: "There are strange things on the edge of the map: sea witches, entangled glimmers, and so on. I'll stick with my ship, thank you very much."

4.name: Olaf
4.text:
Shift: Discard an item card (You may discard an item card to play this on top of one of your characters named Olaf.)
CARROTS ALL AROUND! Whenever he quests, each of your other characters gets +{S} equal to this character's {S} this turn.

4.name: Olaf
4.text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
4.flavor_text: "Isn't this Kristoff's hat? If he went this way, he'll be caught in that storm!"

4.name: Pascal
4.text: COLORFUL TACTICS When you play this character, look at the top 3 cards of your deck and put them back in any order.
4.flavor_text: If you want to find something hidden, get someone who's an expert at hiding.

4.name: Prince Phillip
4.text:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
BEST DEFENSE Whenever one of your characters is chosen for Support, they gain Resist +1 this turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

4.name: Rapunzel
4.text: PERCEPTIVE PARTNER While you have a character named Pascal in play, this character gains Ward. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)
4.flavor_text: "Pascal! A new flower for the wall!"

4.name: Scuttle
4.text: LET ME SEE When you play this character, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal an item card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
4.flavor_text: "Wow. This is special. This is very, very unusual."

4.name: Sisu
4.flavor_text: "It may feel impossible, but sometimes, you just have to take the first step, even before you're ready."

4.name: The Queen
4.text: CONSULT THE SPELLBOOK {E} — Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal an item card and put it into your hand. If that item costs 3 or less, you may play it for free instead and it enters play exerted. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

4.name: Transformed Chef
4.text: A CULINARY MASTERPIECE When you play this character, remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.
4.flavor_text:
"A good, hot meal will set you right as rain."
- Mrs. Potts

4.name: Triton
4.text:
Shift 6 (You may pay 6 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Triton.)
IMPOSING PRESENCE Opposing characters get -1 {S} for each location you have in play.

4.name: Triton
4.text: CONSIGN TO THE DEPTHS {E}, Banish one of your items — Gain 3 lore.
4.flavor_text: "If this is the only way, so be it."

4.name: Triton
4.text:
SUPERIOR SWIMMER During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)
KEEPER OF ATLANTICA Whenever one of your locations is banished, you may put that card into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

4.name: Tuk Tuk
4.flavor_text:
"Some say he's easily distracted. They're not wrong..."
-Raya

4.name: Dig a Little Deeper
4.text:
Sing Together 8 (Any number of your or your teammates' characters with total cost 8 or more may {E} to sing this song for free.)
Look at the top 7 cards of your deck. Put 2 into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

4.name: Glean
4.text: Banish chosen item. Its player gains 2 lore.
4.flavor_text: "Maybe this is just what I need to make my invention work."

4.name: Seldom All They Seem
4.text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Chosen character gets -3 {S} this turn.
4.flavor_text:
I know you
I walked with you once upon a dream

4.name: Treasures Untold
4.text:
(A character with cost 6 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Return up to 2 item cards from your discard into your hand.
4.flavor_text: How many wonders can one cavern hold?

4.name: Field of Ice
4.text: ICY DEFENSE Whenever you play a character, they gain Resist +1 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

4.name: Great Stone Dragon
4.text:
ASLEEP This item enters play exerted.
AWAKEN {E} — Put a character card from your discard into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

4.name: Ice Block
4.text: CHILLY LABOR {E} — Chosen character gets -1 {S} this turn.
4.flavor_text: Frozen ink can be harvested and processed to many useful ends.

4.name: Ariel’s Grotto
4.text: TREASURE TROVE While you have 3 or more items in play, this location gets +2 {L}.

4.name: Winter Camp
4.text: HELP THE WOUNDED Whenever a character quests while here, remove up to 2 damage from them. If they're a Hero character, remove up to 4 damage instead.

4.name: Aladdin
4.text:
Shift: Discard a location card (You may discard a location card to play this on top of one of your characters named Aladdin.)
CRASHING THROUGH Whenever this character quests, you may banish chosen item.

4.name: Aladdin
4.flavor_text: "How about we get straight to the part where I leave quickly and you scream after me? No? I can't say I didn't give you a chance."

4.name: Arges
4.flavor_text:
"Looks like you got some big feelings there, buddy—let's stomp 'em out!"
-Hades

4.name: Ariel
4.text: I WANT MORE Whenever you play a song, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card.
4.flavor_text: Everything she's ever wanted is almost in reach.

4.name: Ariel
4.text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Ariel.)
AMPLIFIED VOICE Whenever you play a song, you may pay 2 {I} to deal 3 damage to chosen character.

4.name: Beast
4.text: Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)
4.flavor_text: He's even tougher than he looks.

4.name: Chi-Fu
4.text: OVERLY CAUTIOUS While this character has no damage, he gets +2 {L}.
4.flavor_text: "You, there! Keep that fighting away from here! It is imperative that I write to the Emperor."

4.name: Chien-Po
4.text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

4.name: Donald Duck
4.text: BOARDING PARTY During your turn, whenever this character banishes a character in a challenge, your other characters get +1 {L} this turn.
4.flavor_text: Nobody stands a chance against the daring duck of the high seas!

4.name: Hercules
4.text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)

4.name: LeFou
4.text: I LEARNED FROM THE BEST During your turn, you may play this character for free if an opposing character was banished in a challenge this turn.

4.name: Li Shang
4.flavor_text: Immovable as a mountain and fierce as a dragon—the Empire's finest warrior.

4.name: Ling
4.text: FULL OF SPIRIT Your Hero characters get +1 {S}.
4.flavor_text: A good friend is handy in a fight.

4.name: Luisa Madrigal
4.text: I'M THE STRONG ONE While you have another character in play, this character gets +2 {S}.
4.flavor_text: There's no way Ursula's creatures are getting to that donkey.

4.name: Magic Broom
4.text: WINGED FOR A DAY During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)
4.flavor_text: It spends its days keeping the treasured glimmers in the Hall of Lorcana sparkling clean.

4.name: Magic Broom
4.text:
Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)
ARMY OF BROOMS This character gets +2 {S} for each other character named Magic Broom you have in play.

4.name: Mickey Mouse
4.text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Mickey Mouse.)
Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)
SWEEP AWAY When you play this character, deal damage to chosen character equal to the number of Broom characters you have in play.

4.name: Mickey Mouse
4.text: STAND STRONG When you play this character, chosen character gains Challenger +2 this turn. (They get +2 {S} while challenging.)
4.flavor_text: He sets the standard for intrepid adventurers everywhere.

4.name: Mulan
4.flavor_text: "Maybe what I really wanted was to prove I could do things right, so when I looked in the mirror, I'd see someone worthwhile."

4.name: Philoctetes
4.text:
YOU GOTTA STAY FOCUSED Your Hero characters gain Challenger +1. (They get +1 {S} while challenging.)
SHAMELESS PROMOTER Whenever you play a Hero character, gain 1 lore.

4.name: Piglet
4.text:
Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)
NOT SO SMALL ANYMORE While you have no cards in your hand, this character can challenge ready characters.

4.name: Rajah
4.text: STEADY GAZE While you have no cards in your hand, characters with cost 4 or less can't challenge this character.
4.flavor_text: As regal as his namesake and just as powerful.

4.name: Raya
4.text:
Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2 {S}.)
Resist +2 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 2.)
YOU GAVE IT YOUR BEST During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may draw a card.

4.name: Yao
4.text: Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2 {S}.)
4.flavor_text: "I'm gonna hit you so hard, it'll make your ancestors dizzy."

4.name: Avalanche
4.text: Deal 1 damage to each opposing character. You may banish chosen location.
4.flavor_text: A little snow never hurt anyone. That big rock, however...

4.name: I Find ’Em, I Flatten ’Em
4.text:
(A character with cost 4 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Banish all items.
4.flavor_text: All the most difficult missions are for me, because I am indestructible.

4.name: One Last Hope
4.text:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Chosen character gains Resist +2 until the start of your next turn. If a Hero character is chosen, they may also challenge ready characters this turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)

4.name: The Mob Song
4.text:
Sing Together 10 (Any number of your or your teammates' characters with total cost 10 or more may {E} to sing this song for free.)
Deal 3 damage to up to 3 chosen characters and/or locations.

4.name: Triton's Decree
4.text: Each opponent chooses one of their characters and deals 2 damage to them.
4.flavor_text: "Ursula's foul creatures are not welcome in my kingdom!"

4.name: Fortisphere
4.text:
RESOURCEFUL When you play this item, you may draw a card.
EXTRACT OF STEEL 1 {I}, Banish this item — Chosen character of yours gains Bodyguard until the start of your next turn. (An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

4.name: Imperial Bow
4.text: WITHIN RANGE {E}, 1 {I} — Chosen Hero character gains Challenger +2 and Evasive this turn. (They get +2 {S} while challenging. They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

4.name: RLS Legacy's Cannon
4.text: BA-BOOM! {E}, 2 {I}, Discard a card — Deal 2 damage to chosen character or location.
4.flavor_text:
"So help me, I'll use the ship's cannons to blast ya all to kingdom come!"
- John Silver

4.name: The Wall
4.text: PROTECT THE REALM While you have an exerted character here, your other locations can't be challenged.

4.name: Thebes
4.text: IF YOU CAN MAKE IT HERE... During your turn, whenever a character banishes another character in a challenge while here, gain 2 lore.

4.text:
Singer 9 (This character counts as cost 9 to sing songs.)
BEAUTIFUL VOICE Whenever this character sings a song, your other Princess characters get +1 {L} this turn.

4.text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
DRAMATIC ENTRANCE When you play this character, banish chosen opposing character with 5 {S} or more.

Sing Together 7 (Any number of your or your teammates' characters with total cost 7 or more may {E} to sing this song for free.)

4.text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Ursula.)
NOW I AM THE RULER! Whenever this character quests, exert chosen character.
YOU'LL LISTEN TO ME! Other characters can't exert to sing songs.

4.name: Yen Sid
4.text:
TIMELY INTERVENTION When you play this character, if you have a character named Magic Broom in play, you may draw a card.
ARCANE STUDY While you have 2 or more Broom characters in play, this character gets +2 {L}.

4.name: Second Star to the Right

Sing Together 10 (Any number of your or your teammates' characters with total cost 10 or more may {E} to sing this song for free.)
Chosen player draws 5 cards.

4.name: Diablo
4.text:
Shift: Discard an action card (You may discard an action card to play this on top of one of your characters named Diablo.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
CIRCLE FAR AND WIDE During each opponent's turn, whenever they draw a card while this character is exerted, you may draw a card.

4.name: Jasmine
4.text: CUNNING MANEUVER When you play this character and whenever she's challenged, each opponent chooses and discards a card.

4.name: We Don't Talk About Bruno
4.text:
(A character with cost 5 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Return chosen character to their player's hand, then that player discards a card at random.

4.name: Goofy
4.text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
SUPER PEANUT POWERS Whenever this character challenges another character, gain 2 lore.

4.name: Sisu
4.text:
Shift 6 (You may pay 6 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Sisu.)
I GOT THIS! When you play this character, banish all opposing characters with 2 {S} or less.

4.name: Snuggly Duckling
4.text: ROUTINE RUCKUS Whenever a character with 3 {S} or more challenges another character while here, gain 1 lore. If the challenging character has 6 {S} or more, gain 3 lore instead.

4.name: Anna
4.text: LET ME HELP YOU Whenever this character quests, your other Hero characters get +1 {L} this turn.

4.text: CONSULT THE SPELLBOOK {E} — Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal an item card and put it into your hand. If that item costs 3 or less, you may play it for free instead and it enters play exerted. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

4.name: Ariel’s Grotto
4.text: TREASURE TROVE While you have 3 or more items in play, this location gets +2 {L}.

4.name: Ariel

Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Ariel.)
AMPLIFIED VOICE Whenever you play a song, you may pay 2 {I} to deal 3 damage to chosen character.

Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)
NOT SO SMALL ANYMORE While you have no cards in your hand, this character can challenge ready characters.

4.name: The Wall
4.text: PROTECT THE REALM While you have an exerted character here, your other locations can't be challenged.

4.name: Yen Sid
4.text:
TIMELY INTERVENTION When you play this character, if you have a character named Magic Broom in play, you may draw a card.
ARCANE STUDY While you have 2 or more Broom characters in play, this character gets +2 {L}.

4.name: Mulan
4.text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Mulan.)
STRAIGHT SHOOTER When you play this character, if you used Shift to play her, she gets +3 {S} this turn.
TRIPLE SHOT During your turn, whenever this character deals damage to another character in a challenge, deal the same amount of damage to up to 2 other chosen characters.

4.name: Mickey Mouse
4.text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Mickey Mouse.)
Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)
SWEEP AWAY When you play this character, deal damage to chosen character equal to the number of Broom characters you have in play.

5.name: Koda
5.text: TELL EVERYBODY During opponents' turns, you can't lose lore.
5.flavor_text: "I mean, I don't want to brag or nothing, but I got some moves."

5.name: Nala
5.flavor_text: The Lorcana Hide-and-Seek Championship was hers for the taking.

5.name: Prince Naveen
5.text:
Singer 6 (This character counts as cost 6 to sing songs.)
IT'S BEAUTIFUL, NO? When you play this character, you may play a song with cost 6 or less for free.

5.name: Rutt
5.text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
5.flavor_text: "Let's find some nice twigs, eh? I could use a snack!"

5.name: Kenai
5.text: BROTHERS FOREVER While this character is exerted, your characters named Koda can't be challenged.
5.flavor_text:
"You have to look after your little brother, no matter how big a pain he is."
-Kenai

5.name: Vanellope von Schweetz
5.flavor_text: "Look, the code may say I'm a princess, but I know who I really am..."

5.name: Tuke
5.flavor_text: "I'd love a snack, but I'm kinda tied up right now."

5.name: Lilo
5.text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
5.flavor_text: "Peanut butter and pineapple! This'll be the best cake ever!"

5.name: Vanellope von Schweetz
5.text: YOU'VE GOT TO PAY TO PLAY Whenever this character quests, chosen opposing character gets -1 {S} until the start of your next turn.
5.flavor_text: "I'll take whatever you've got...as long as it's got sugar in it."

5.name: Fix-It Felix, Jr.
5.text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
5.flavor_text: "Golly, this place is going to take some real fixing!"

5.name: Gazelle
5.text: Singer 5 (This character counts as cost 5 to sing songs.)
5.flavor_text: "Good evening, Lorcana! We are here tonight to celebrate the possibilities that open up to us when we unite."

5.name: Fix-It Felix, Jr.
5.text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Fix-It Felix, Jr.)
BUILDING TOGETHER Your locations get +2 {W}.

5.name: Kristoff
5.text:
SONG OF THE HERD For each song card in your discard, you pay 1 {I} less to play this character.
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

5.name: Mirabel Madrigal
5.text: NOT WITHOUT MY FAMILY You can't play this character unless you have 5 or more characters in play.
5.flavor_text: "There's nothing we can't accomplish together!"

5.name: Minnie Mouse
5.text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Minnie Mouse.)
PARADE ORDER When you play this character, if you used Shift to play her, you may search your deck for a character card and reveal that card to all players. Shuffle your deck and put that card on top of it.

5.name: Daisy Duck
5.text: BIG PRIZE Whenever this character quests, each opponent reveals the top card of their deck. If it's a character card, they may put it into their hand. Otherwise, they put it on the bottom of their deck.

5.name: Fix-It Felix, Jr.
5.text: OH, MY LAND! When you play this character, if you have a location in play, draw a card.
5.flavor_text: "I don't think I've ever seen anything as sweet as this."

5.name: Moana
5.flavor_text: "Investigate every part of the Illuminary, find the chromicons, restore the Illuminary, how hard can it—wait, what was that noise?"

5.name: Vanellope von Schweetz
5.text:
Shift 2 (You may pay 2 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Vanellope von Schweetz.)
I HEREBY DECREE Whenever you play another Princess character, all opposing characters get -1 {S} until the start of your next turn.

5.name: Alan-a-Dale
5.text: FAN FAVORITE Whenever you play a song, gain 1 lore.
5.flavor_text: "Thank you! Now here's a little ditty for our floodborn friends that we call 'Martin and the Flood.'"

5.name: Wreck-It Ralph
5.text: I'VE GOT THE COOLEST FRIEND When you play this character, return a character card from your discard to your hand. If that card is a Princess character card, gain 2 lore.
5.flavor_text: If he must give a victory speech, he'll keep it brief.

5.name: Maid Marian
5.text: IF IT PLEASES THE LADY When you play this character, chosen opposing character gets -5 {S} until the start of your next turn.
5.flavor_text: "And who might you be, my noble knight and champion?"

5.name: Sven
5.text: REINDEER GAMES When you play this character, you may ready chosen character. They can't quest or challenge for the rest of this turn.

5.name: Minnie Mouse
5.text: PATCH THEM UP Whenever this character quests, you may remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.
5.flavor_text: "Oh my! Is that part of the Illuminary? I have to go help!"

5.name: Try Everything
5.text:
(A character with cost 4 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Remove up to 3 damage from chosen character and ready them. They can't quest or challenge for the rest of this turn.
5.flavor_text: I want to try even though I could fail

5.name: Healing Touch
5.text: Remove up to 4 damage from chosen character. Draw a card.
5.flavor_text: "The heart is not so easily changed, but the head can be persuaded." —Grand Pabbie

5.name: Revive
5.text: Play a character card with cost 5 or less from your discard for free.
5.flavor_text: Not all that is lost is gone forever.

5.name: Blast from Your Past
5.text:
(A character with cost 6 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Name a card. Return all character cards with that name from your discard to your hand.

5.name: Invited to the Ball
5.text: Reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Put revealed character cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

5.name: Healing Decanter
5.text: RENEWING ESSENCE {E} — Remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

5.name: Queen's Sensor Core
5.text:
SYMBOL OF NOBILITY At the start of your turn, if you have a Princess or Queen character in play, gain 1 lore.

6.flavor_text: "A promotion! It's about time someone recognized my natural leadership skills!"

6.name: Daisy Duck

6.flavor_text: "The answers we're looking for are on the other side of that maze, I just know it!"

6.name: Prince Phillip
6.text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

6.name: Jasmine
6.text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Jasmine.)
RULER OF THE SEAS When you play this character, if you used Shift to play her, return all other exerted characters to their players’ hands.

6.name: Peter Pan
6.text:
LOOK INNOCENT This character enters play exerted.
CAN'T TAKE A JOKE? While this character is exerted, each opposing player can't gain lore unless one of their characters has challenged this turn.

6.name: Hercules
6.text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

6.flavor_text: "Sleek yet strong... These inkrunners are an extraordinary feat of engineering."

Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Basil.)

(A character with cost 2 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)

Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

6.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

6.text: KEEP DRIVING While this character has damage, she gets +1 {L}.

6.flavor_text: "You wanna tell me I don't know what I'm doing? I know I don't!"

6.text:

6.name: Moana
6.text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Moana.)

6.name: Goofy
6.text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

(A character with cost 3 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)

6.flavor_text: "Of course! It all makes perfect sense. That's why my old star charts are useless. Every star in the sky here is different!"

6.flavor_text: "I told you we'd find an island eventually! Excellent navigating. Yes, yes, I'm quite proud. Now, a toast to our success!"

6.name: Hercules
6.text: Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2 {S}).

Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Jim Hawkins.)

Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

7.name: Rhino
7.text: DESTINY CALLING Your other characters get +2 {W}.
7.flavor_text: "Don't forget, you are awesome. You can handle anything. Now channel your inner awesomeness and CLEAR THIS TRAP!"

7.name: Perdita
7.text:
WHO'S NEXT? Whenever this character quests, you pay 2 {I} less for the next Puppy character you play this turn.

7.flavor_text: Every parent struggles with getting their baby to sleep. Kings are no different.

7.name: Bolt
7.text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Bolt.)

7.name: Roger Radcliffe
7.text: THERE YOU GO Whenever this character quests, you may remove up to 1 damage from each of your Puppy characters.
7.flavor_text: The best part of completing the obstacle course was finding their human at the end.

7.name: Trusty
7.text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
7.flavor_text: "As my grandpappy, Old Reliable, used to say, save your energy for when it matters."

7.name: Peg
7.text: CAPTIVE AUDIENCE {E} — If you have 3 or more other characters in play, draw a card.
7.flavor_text: She was born to be a star no matter where she performed.

7.name: Suzy
7.flavor_text: The devoted mice were excited to surprise Cinderella with a new dress. Smiling, Archazia gave them a spool of magic thread. "This will make it perfect," she said.

7.name: Mittens
7.text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
NO THANKS NECESSARY Once during your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, your other characters with Bodyguard get +1 {L} this turn.

7.name: Tramp
7.text:
NOW IT'S A PARTY For each character you have in play, you pay 1 {I} less to play this character.
HOW'S PICKINGS? When you play this character, you may draw a card for each other character you have in play, then choose and discard that many cards.

7.name: The Troubadour
7.text:
Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)
Singer 4 (This character counts as cost 4 to sing songs.)

7.name: Wendy Darling
7.text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
TELL NO TALES Whenever one of your other characters is banished, you may remove all damage from chosen character.

7.name: Mirabel Madrigal
7.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.) Singer 5 (This character counts as cost 5 to sing songs.)
7.flavor_text: "My family's amazing, and I'm in my family, so..."

7.name: Aurora
7.text:
Singer 5 (This character counts as cost 5 to sing songs.)
SWEET DREAMS Whenever you remove 1 or more damage from a character, ready this character. She can't quest or challenge for the rest of this turn.

7.name: Cinderella
7.text: IF THE SLIPPER FITS When you play this character, you may put an item card named The Glass Slipper from your discard on the bottom of your deck to gain 3 lore.
7.flavor_text: "But, you see, I have the other slipper."

7.name: Mariano Guzman
7.text: I SEE YOU While you have a character named Dolores Madrigal in play, this character gets +1 {L}.
7.flavor_text: The puzzles of the heart are trickier than anything Archazia could come up with.

7.name: Candlehead
7.text: WINNING ISN'T EVERYTHING When this character is banished, you may remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

7.name: Bolt
7.text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
7.flavor_text: "Super dog versus super log! This is AWESOME!" —Rhino

7.name: Pascal
7.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
7.flavor_text: Once Pascal got into Archazia's flowerbeds, there was no getting him out.

7.name: King Candy
7.text: SWEET REVENGE Whenever one of your other Racer characters is banished, each opponent chooses and banishes one of their characters.
7.flavor_text: "Get off of my track!"

7.name: Penny
7.text: ENDURING LOYALTY When you play this character, you may remove up to 2 damage from chosen character and they gain Resist +1 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

7.name: Fix-It Felix, Jr.
7.text: LET'S GET TO WORK Whenever you return a Racer character card from your discard to your hand, you may ready chosen Racer character. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.
7.flavor_text: "A trap is just a puzzle that's not very friendly."

7.name: Thunderbolt
7.text:
Puppy Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your Puppy characters.)
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

7.text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

7.name: Isabela Madrigal
7.text: I'M TIRED OF PERFECT Whenever one of your characters sings a song, this character can't be challenged until the start of your next turn.
7.flavor_text: "I just made something unexpected. Something sharp, something new."

7.name: Calhoun
7.text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Calhoun.)
BACK TO START POSITIONS! Whenever this character challenges another character, you may return a Racer character card from your discard to your hand.

7.name: Wreck-It Ralph
7.text: OUTFLANK During your turn, whenever one of your other characters is banished, this character gets +1 {L} this turn.
7.flavor_text: "I got that medal in the bag."

7.name: Lady
7.text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Lady.)
SOMETHING WONDERFUL When you play this character, you may return up to 2 character cards with cost 2 or less each from your discard to your hand.

7.name: Pongo
7.text: FOUND YOU, YOU LITTLE RASCAL At the start of your turn, look at the cards in your inkwell. You may play a Puppy character from there for free.
7.flavor_text: Tricks and traps are nothing for plucky pups.

7.name: Kenai
7.text: HE NEEDS ME At the end of your turn, if this character is exerted, you may ready another chosen character of yours and remove all damage from them.

7.name: Minnie Mouse
7.text:
GATHER AROUND Whenever you play a character, this character gets +1 {L} this turn.
JUST ONE MORE Whenever this character quests, chosen opposing character loses {S} equal to this character's {L} until the start of your next turn.

7.name: Perla
7.text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character’s {S} this turn.)

7.name: Snow White
7.text: HIDDEN AWAY This character can't be challenged.
7.flavor_text: A true heart can thwart many an evil scheme.

7.name: Koda
7.flavor_text: "And then they were like, 'How'd you catch so many fish, Koda?' And I said, 'Well, you know me. I know how to catch fish.' And they said..."

7.name: Mirabel Madrigal
7.text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Mirabel Madrigal.)
HER OWN SPECIAL GIFT Whenever this character quests, you may return a song card with cost 3 or less from your discard to your hand.

7.text: TACTICAL ADVANTAGE When you play this character, you may choose and discard a card to give chosen opposing character -3 {S} until the start of your next turn.
7.flavor_text: "Preparation and luck—you can only rely on one to win a fight!"

7.name: Pepa Madrigal
7.text: CLEAR SKIES, CLEAR SKIES Whenever one or more of your characters sings a song, gain 1 lore.
7.flavor_text: Archazia's calming presence helped Pepa dispel her dark mood.

7.name: So Much to Give
7.text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)

7.text: Remove up to 3 damage from chosen character or location. Draw a card.

7.name: The Family Madrigal
7.text:
(A character with cost 5 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. You may reveal up to 1 Madrigal character card and up to 1 song card and put them into your hand. Put the rest on the top of your deck in any order.

7.name: Spaghetti Dinner

"Hey, Tony's! Of course. The very place for a very special occasion."
—Tramp

7.name: Kanine Krunchies

7.flavor_text: "Happy dogs are those who eat nutritious Kanine Krunchies!"

7.name: The Glass Slipper

7.flavor_text: "This is a place of wonder and learning. Pay attention to the Owl and see what she can teach you."

7.name: Treasure Guardian

7.name: Iago
7.text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

7.flavor_text: "Now that the Hexwell Crown is finally mine, no force in Lorcana can stand against me!"

7.name: Hades
7.text: FOR JUST A LITTLE PAIN When you play this character, you may deal 2 damage to another chosen character of yours to banish chosen character with cost 3 or less.
7.flavor_text: "... You get a whole lotta gain."

7.name: Madame Medusa
7.text: SEARCH THE SWAMP Whenever this character quests, you may deal 2 damage to another chosen character of yours to put the top 3 cards of chosen player's deck into their discard.

7.name: Te Kā
7.text:
Shift 7 (You may pay 7 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Te Kā.)
ANCIENT RAGE During your turn, whenever an opposing character is exerted, banish them.

7.name: Elsa
7.text: WHAT DO WE DO NOW? Whenever this character quests, if you have a character named Anna in play, gain 1 lore.
7.flavor_text: "Fear is what can't be trusted."

7.name: Madam Mim
7.text: PLAY ROUGH Whenever this character quests, exert chosen opposing character.
7.flavor_text: "She only wants rules so she can break them!" —Archimedes

7.name: Giant Cobra
7.text:
Vanish (When an opponent chooses this character for an action, banish them.)
MYSTERIOUS ADVANTAGE When you play this character, you may choose and discard a card to gain 2 lore.

7.name: Te Kā
7.text: Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2 {S}.)
7.flavor_text: "You wanna get to Te Fiti, you have to go through a whole ocean of bad. Not to mention Te Kā." —Maui

7.name: Yzma
7.text: I WIN When this character is banished, if you have more cards in your hand than each opponent, you may return this card to your hand.
7.flavor_text: "Yes, I've already finished this course. I'm still going to bounce a few more times."

7.name: Bucky
7.text: POP! When this character is banished in a challenge, you may draw a card.
7.flavor_text: "Oh, hang on. I love this bit! He pops the balloon and all those acorns go flying out. Gets me every time." —Kronk

7.name: Pain
7.flavor_text: "Um, wasn't there something the boss wanted us to take care of? Was it testing these arrows?"

7.name: Rajah
7.text: Vanish (When an opponent chooses this character for an action, banish them.)
7.flavor_text: He may be spectral, but the danger is very real.

7.name: Kronk
7.text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
I'M LOVIN' THIS If an effect would cause you to discard one or more cards, you don't discard.

7.name: Mother Gothel
7.text: NOW YOU'VE UPSET ME Whenever one of your characters challenges, you may move 1 damage counter from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

7.name: Sven
7.text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
FORMIDABLE GLARE When you play this character, chosen character gets -3 {S} this turn.

7.name: Diablo
7.text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2 {S})

7.text: PRESTIDIGITONIUM Whenever this character quests, name a card, then reveal the top card of your deck. If it's the named card, put it into your inkwell facedown and exerted. Otherwise, put it on the top of your deck.

7.name: Yzma
7.text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Yzma.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
BACK TO WORK Whenever another character is banished in a challenge, return that card to its player's hand, then that player discards a card at random.

7.name: Elsa
7.text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Elsa.)
WINTER WALL Whenever this character quests, you may exert chosen character. If you do and you have a character named Anna in play, the chosen character can’t ready at the start of their next turn.

7.name: Kenai
7.text:
Challenger +2 (While challenging, this character gets +2 {S}.)
WISDOM OF HIS STORY During your turn, when this character is banished in a challenge, return this card to your hand and gain 1 lore.

7.name: Kuzco
7.text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
WE CAN FIGURE THIS OUT At the start of your turn, choose one: 
• Each player draws a card. 
• Each player chooses and discards a card.

7.name: Anna
7.text:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
WINTER AMBUSH When you play this character, chosen opposing character can't ready at the start of their next turn.

7.name: Donald Duck
7.text: OBFUSCATE! Opponents need 25 lore to win the game.
7.flavor_text: When it comes to magic spells, proper pronunciation is key.

7.name: The Queen
7.text: NO ORDINARY APPLE {E} — Choose 3 cards from chosen opponent's discard and put them on the bottom of their deck to gain 3 lore. If any Princess cards were moved this way, gain 4 lore instead.

7.name: Panic
7.text: STARTLED SHRIEK When you play this character, you may move up to 2 damage counters from chosen character to chosen opposing character.
7.flavor_text: "What the boss doesn't know won't hurt us. Much. I hope."

7.name: Archimedes
7.text: MORE TO LEARN Whenever an opponent chooses this character for an action or ability, you may draw a card.
7.flavor_text: Archazia's library was a treasure trove of knowledge even for such an educated owl.

7.name: Kashekim
7.flavor_text: "You presume much, to think you are welcome here."

7.name: Dolores Madrigal
7.text: I HEAR YOU Whenever one of your characters sings a song, chosen opponent reveals their hand.
7.flavor_text: She heard Mariano's heart skip a beat. Was it because of the puzzle, or was he looking at her?

7.name: Mufasa
7.text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Mufasa.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)

7.name: Magical Maneuvers
7.text: Return chosen character of yours to your hand. Exert chosen character.
7.flavor_text:
"Oh, I'm sure it's fine if we move these traps around. Archazia won't mind a little magic".
—Flora

7.name: This Is My Family
7.text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Gain 1 lore. Draw a card.
7.flavor_text: So many stars, and everybody gets to shine

7.name: Show Me More!
7.text: Each player draws 3 cards.
7.flavor_text:
"Weave of time, attend to me—
Reveal the moments soon to be!"

7.name: Restoring the Crown
7.text: Exert all opposing characters. Whenever one of your characters banishes another character in a challenge this turn, gain 2 lore.
7.flavor_text: The Hexwell surged with pure creative energy, fusing the crown's pieces in a final burst of power.

7.name: Amethyst Coil
7.text: MAGICAL TOUCH During your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, you may move 1 damage counter from chosen character to chosen opposing character.
7.flavor_text: Shanzay's coil flared, sending a tendril of mystical energy toward the damaged glimmer.

7.name: Drizella
7.flavor_text: Once again, Drizella was confronted with a simple truth: life wasn't fair.

7.name: Grewnge
7.text: RAPID FIRE Whenever this character quests, you pay 1 {I} less for the next action you play this turn.
7.flavor_text: He loves two things: explosions and even more explosions.

7.name: Baymax
7.text: SHHHHH This character enters play exerted.
7.flavor_text: "Processing data from Archazia's thought scrolls is taking a great deal of power. Extreme battery saver protocol engaged."

7.name: Thomas O'Malley
7.text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
7.flavor_text: There's nothing he can't talk his way out of.

7.name: Pete
7.text: PILFER AND PLUNDER Whenever you play an action that isn't a song, you may banish chosen item.
7.flavor_text: "I wasn't stealin' it! I was just keepin' it safe."

7.name: Hiro Hamada
7.text: ORIGIN STORY When you play a Floodborn character on this card, draw a card.
7.flavor_text: Even with a mind as brilliant as his, the mixed ink was a unique puzzle to solve.

7.name: Cheshire Cat
7.text: MAD GRIN When you play this character, you may deal 2 damage to chosen damaged character.
7.flavor_text: "He's not your average cat, after all. Then again, what cat is?" — Archazia

7.name: Shere Khan
7.text: WHAT A PITY When you play this character, discard your hand.
7.flavor_text: He'd be the first to tell you he's as magnificent as he is deadly.

7.name: Basil
7.text: DRAW THEM OUT Whenever this character quests, opposing damaged characters gain Reckless during their next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)
7.flavor_text: "The final part of the crown! Jafar will be pleased."

7.name: Mad Hatter
7.text: UNBIRTHDAY PRESENT Whenever a damaged character challenges another character, you may draw a card.
7.flavor_text: "Don't you care for tea?"

7.name: Queen of Hearts
7.text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Queen of Hearts.)
IF I LOSE MY TEMPER... Whenever another character is played, put a damage counter on them.

7.name: Hiro Hamada
7.text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Hiro Hamada.)
YOU CAN BE WAY MORE Your Floodborn characters that have a card under them gain Evasive and Ward. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them. Opponents can’t choose them except to challenge.)

7.name: Yokai
7.text: INNOVATE You pay 1 {I} less to play characters using their Shift ability.
7.flavor_text: "In the hands of a lesser person, this much power would be irresponsible."

7.name: Donald Duck
7.text: DUCK OF ACTION Whenever this character is challenged, you may return an action card that isn't a song card from your discard to your hand.
7.flavor_text: "Aye aye, Captain! I'll get it done."

7.name: Berlioz
7.flavor_text: "Look what I found! Can we stay here and play?"

7.name: Lady
7.text: A DOG'S LIFE While you have a character named Tramp in play, this character gets +1 {L}.
7.flavor_text: "Are you sure we're allowed in here? Jim Dear would never allow me in the kitchen."

7.name: Yzma
7.text: HOW SHALL I DO IT? When you play this character, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card.
7.flavor_text: "One of these must be the right lever, but I'll be a llama's aunt if I can figure out which one..."

7.name: Pacha
7.text: FULL PACK While you have more cards in your hand than each opponent, this character gets +2 {L}.
7.flavor_text: He liked to prepare for any emergency. They happened frequently with Kuzco around.

7.name: Tweedledee & Tweedledum
7.text: ANOTHER RECITATION Whenever this character quests, you may return chosen damaged character to their player's hand.
7.flavor_text:
"You can't leave yet! Don't you want to hear the ending? "
—Tweedledee

7.name: Baymax
7.text:
Universal Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of any one of your characters.)
FUNCTIONALITY IMPROVED When you play this character, if you used Shift to play him, remove all damage from him.

7.name: Gizmoduck
7.text:
Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)
BLATHERING BLATHERSKITE This character can challenge ready damaged characters.

7.name: Fidget
7.text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
I TOOK CARE OF EVERYTHING Whenever this character quests, another chosen character of yours gains Evasive until the start of your next turn.

7.name: Mr. Smee
7.text: PIPE UP THE CREW Whenever you play an action that isn't a song, you may ready chosen Pirate character.
7.flavor_text: "All right now, crew–we've a lot to do today!"

7.name: Daisy Duck
7.text: FOWL PLAY Once during your turn, whenever a card is put into your inkwell, chosen opponent chooses one of their characters and returns that card to their hand.
7.flavor_text: A captain must be inventive, commanding, and unafraid of trampolines.

7.name: John Silver
7.text:
DRAWN TO A FIGHT If an opposing character was damaged this turn, you pay 2 {I} less to play this character.
Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)
I AIN'T GONE SOFT! Whenever you play an action that isn't a song, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character.

7.name: Tramp
7.text:
HEY, PIDGE If you have a character named Lady in play, you pay 1 {I} less to play this character.
NO TIME FOR WISECRACKS When you play this character, chosen character of yours gets +1 {S} this turn for each other character you have in play.

(A character with cost 1 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)

Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)

Shift 7

8.name: Gyro Gearloose
8.text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
I'LL SHOW YOU! When you play this character, chosen opposing character gets -3 {S} this turn.

8.name: Vanellope Von Schweetz
8.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

8.name: Brutus

8.name: Brutus
8.text: SPITEFUL During your turn, when this character is banished, if one of your characters was damaged this turn, gain 2 lore.
8.flavor_text: He's identical to Nero in cruelty and classiness.

8.name: The Dodo
8.text: EXTRAORDINARY SITUATION This character gets +1 {S} for each 1 damage on him.

8.text: THIS WAY OUT When you play this character, you may ready chosen damaged character of yours. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

8.flavor_text: "Sacrebleu! This is no way to treat a guest in your palace!"

8.flavor_text: "Move, move, move! There's no time to explain. Well, maybe a little time, so listen up..."

8.flavor_text: "You were so focused on me and Mulan that you forgot about my man Cri-Kee here. And that was a mistake!" —Mushu

8.flavor_text: "Say hello to Figaro. Up to mischief already!" —Geppetto

8.name: Thumper

8.flavor_text: C'mon! Let's show that mean old high sultan what's what."

8.name: Wreck-It Ralph

8.flavor_text: "After that dreadful Ratigan business, I know about villains. This Jafar is certainly a villain of the highest order."

8.flavor_text: "Now, don't fret over the mess, love. We'll have everything shipshape in no time."

10.text:
Shift 7 {I} (You may pay 7 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Magica De Spell.)
SHADOW'S GRASP When you play this character, if you used Shift to play her, you may draw 4 cards.

10.name: Demona
10.text:
AD SAXUM COMMUTATE When you play this character, exert all opposing characters. Then, each player with fewer than 3 cards in their hand draws until they have 3.
STONE BY DAY If you have 3 or more cards in your hand, this character can't ready.

10.name: Hades
10.text: WHAT D'YA SAY? When you play this character, you may choose an opposing character. If you do, draw 2 cards unless that character’s player puts that card on the bottom of their deck.
10.flavor_text: "I'm kind of on a schedule here—I got plans for August."

10.name: Olaf
10.text: SECOND CHANCE When this character leaves play, you may return chosen character of yours to your hand.
10.flavor_text: "Here, hold this while I get help. Try not to go anywhere."

10.name: Merlin
10.text:
Boost 2 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 2 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
LEGACY OF LEARNING When this character is banished in a challenge, if he had a card under him, draw 2 cards.

10.name: Ursula
10.text:
Boost 1 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 1 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
SLIPPERY SPELL While there's a card under this character, she gets +1 {L} and gains Evasive. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

10.name: Cheshire Cat
10.text:
Boost 2 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 2 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
IT'S LOADS OF FUN Whenever you put a card under this character, you may move up to 2 damage counters from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

10.name: Begone!
10.text: Return chosen character, item, or location with cost 3 or less to their player's hand.
10.flavor_text: "Alakazam, alakazook, send this page back to its book!"

10.name: Can't Hold It Back Anymore
10.text:
(A character with cost 4 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Exert chosen opposing character. Move all damage counters from all other characters to that character.

10.name: Swooping Strike
10.text: Each opponent chooses and exerts one of their ready characters.
10.flavor_text: You could try to run...

10.name: Performance Review
10.text: {E} chosen ready character of yours to draw cards equal to that character’s {L}.
10.flavor_text: "Listen, fellas, it's a real 'what have you done for me lately' business. So give me something to work with here!"

10.name: Fragile as a Flower
10.text:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Draw a card. Exert chosen character with cost 2 or less. They can't ready at the start of their next turn.

10.name: Junior Woodchuck Guidebook
10.text: THE BOOK KNOWS EVERYTHING {E}, 1 {I}, Banish this item — Draw 2 cards.
10.flavor_text:
"How come ghosts get a whole section, but not were-ducks?!"
—Huey

10.name: Grimorum Arcanorum
10.text:
DOCTRINA ADDUCERE During your turn, whenever an opposing character becomes exerted, gain 1 lore.
CELERITAS Your characters named Demona gain Rush. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)

10.name: The Great Illuminary
10.text: STARTLING DISCOVERY Characters gain " {E} — Draw a card" while here.
10.flavor_text: "Remember, we're looking for clues to who tore up the lorebook pages." —Elisa Maza

10.name: Baloo
10.flavor_text: "I tell ya, for a spooky forest, this place is all right. Plenty of berries, lots of trees for back-scratching... A bear could do a lot worse."

10.name: Big Nose
10.flavor_text:
"Thou art pretty as a brawl
Thy hair's as dark as a moonless night
Thy cheeks the red of leaves in fall—
I love to sit and watch you fight"

10.name: Flotsam
10.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
10.flavor_text: "You're in our world now."

10.name: Kaa
10.text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
10.flavor_text: "It's bessst to play it s-ssafe."

10.name: Webby Vanderquack
10.text: CONTAGIOUS ENERGY When you play this character, chosen character gets +1 {S} this turn.
10.flavor_text: "It's happening! IT'S HAPPENING! There's a whisper nearby, and I get to see it!"

10.name: Finnick
10.text: YOU BETTER RUN When you play this character, you may pay 2 {I} to return chosen opposing character with 2 {S} or less to their player's hand.

10.name: Vladimir
10.text: HIGH STANDARDS Whenever this character quests, you may banish chosen item.
10.flavor_text: His commitment to excellent craftsmanship is unparalleled.

10.name: Flintheart Glomgold
10.text: TRY ME While you have a character or location in play with a card under them, this character gains Ward. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)
10.flavor_text: "Long live Glomgold! Glomgold! Glomgold!"

10.name: Jetsam
10.text: AMBUSH FROM THE DEEP When you play this character, deal 3 damage to chosen opposing damaged character.
10.flavor_text: "You're coming with us."

10.name: Hook Hand
10.flavor_text: "You're a strange lookin' glimmer, ain'tcha?" he said to the whisper lingering uncertainly in the doorway. "Welcome to the Snuggly Duckling!"

10.name: Kaa
10.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
10.flavor_text: It's hard to tell where the branches end and the snake begins.

10.name: Emily Quackfaster
10.text: RECOMMENDED READING When you play this character, you may put the top card of your deck facedown under one of your characters or locations with Boost.
10.flavor_text: "Hana's Herborium? The book that Illumineer wrote? Our only copy has been checked out, sadly."

10.name: Flynn Rider
10.text:
Boost 2 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 2 {I} to put the top card of your deck face down under this character.)
I'LL TAKE THAT As long as this character has at least one card under it, it gets +2 {S} and +1 {L}.

10.name: Bellwether
10.text: VENDETTA When this character is challenged and banished, put 1 damage counter on each opposing character.
10.flavor_text: "I will have sweet revenge!"

10.name: Launchpad
10.text: OFF THE MAP When you play this character, you may banish chosen location.
10.flavor_text: "You can't spell 'crash-landed' without 'landed'!"

10.name: Penumbra
10.flavor_text: "You will treat the vastly superior Moon with respect, or you will suffer the ultimate consequence."

10.name: Baloo
10.text:
Shift 3 {I} (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Baloo.)
ROLL WITH IT When you play this character, choose one:
- Each player draws a card.
- Each player chooses and discards a card.

10.name: Megara
10.text:
Boost 1 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 1 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
I'LL BE FINE While there's a card under this character, she gets +1 {L} and gains "Whenever this character is challenged, each opponent chooses and discards a card."

10.name: Goldie O'Gilt
10.text:
CLAIM JUMPER When you play this character, chosen opponent reveals their hand and discards a location card of your choice.
STRIKE GOLD Whenever this character quests, you may put a location card from chosen player's discard on the bottom of their deck to gain 1 lore.

10.name: Shere Khan
10.text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
ON THE HUNT Whenever this character quests, banish chosen opposing damaged character. Then, you may put 1 damage counter on another chosen character.

10.name: Scrooge McDuck
10.text:
BACKUP PLAN When you play this character, draw a card, then choose and discard a card.
ON THE MOVE When this character is challenged, return this card to your hand. (No damage is dealt in that challenge.)

10.name: Akela
10.text: AHEAD OF THE PACK 1 {I} — This character gets +1 {S} this turn.
10.flavor_text: "Follow me, if you can," Akela said, bounding into the Bitterwood. "The hunt is on!"

10.name: Goofy
10.text:
EVEN THE SCORE Whenever one of your other Emerald characters is challenged and banished, banish the challenging character.
PROVIDE COVER Your other Emerald characters gain Ward. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)

10.name: Little John
10.text:
Boost 3 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 3 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
READY TO RASSLE Whenever you put a card under this character, ready him.

10.name: Webby Vanderquack
10.text:
Shift 2 {I} (You may pay 2 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Webby Vanderquack.)
Ward
WORK SMARTER Whenever this character quests, if an opponent has more cards in their inkwell than you, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

10.name: So Be It!
10.text: Each of your characters gets +1 {S} this turn. You may banish chosen item.
10.flavor_text: He's a patient merman—up to a point.

10.name: Trust In Me
10.text:
(A character with cost 6 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Choose one:
- Each opposing character gets -1 until the start of your next turn.
- Each opponent chooses and discards 2 cards.

10.name: Chomp!
10.text: Deal 2 damage to chosen damaged character.
10.flavor_text:
Mickey: "What IS that thing?!"
Goofy: "It's hungry, that's what!"

10.name: Malicious, Mean, and Scary
10.text:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Put 1 damage counter on each opposing character.
10.flavor_text: My sneer could curdle dairy

10.name: Potion of Malice
10.text:
SUPPRESSED ANGER {E}, 1 {I} — Put 1 damage counter on chosen character.
MINDLESS RAGE {E}, Banish this item – Each opposing damaged character gains Reckless until the start of your next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

10.name: Inscrutable Map
10.text: BACKTRACK {E}, 1 {I} — Chosen opposing character gets -1 {L} until the start of your next turn.
10.flavor_text:
Nick: "What kind of nonsense is this?"
Judy: "These symbols must mean something..."

10.name: Enigmatic Inkcaster
10.text: ITS OWN REWARD {E} — If you've played 2 or more cards this turn, gain 1 lore.
10.flavor_text: "Whoever's room this was, I think we just found their inkcaster." —Shanzay, an Illumineer

10.name: Blessed Bagpipes
10.text:
MCDUCK HEIRLOOM When you play this item, you may put the top card of your deck facedown under one of your characters or locations with Boost.
BATTLE ANTHEM Whenever one of your characters or locations with a card under them is challenged, gain 1 lore.

10.name: White Agony Plains
10.text: PURE LIQUID GOLD This location gets +1 {L} for each character here.

10.name: Diablo
10.flavor_text:
"Be careful when gathering herbs in the Inkwell Caverns. You never know who's watching."
—Hana's Herborium

10.name: Ares
10.text: Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.) CALL TO BATTLE Once during your turn, whenever you put a card under one of your characters or locations, you may ready chosen character. If you do, that character can't quest for the rest of this turn.

10.name: Peter Pan
10.text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
10.flavor_text: "Wanna race? Last one through the Inkwell Caverns is a codfish!"

10.name: Tinker Bell
10.flavor_text:
"Okay, now we know pixie dust doesn't affect the torn lorebook pages. Thanks, Tink."
—Venturo, an Illumineer

10.name: Raksha
10.text: ON PATROL Once during your turn, you may pay 1 {I} less to move this character to a location.
10.flavor_text: Her name means "protection," and she'll do anything to defend the cubs under her care.

10.name: Shere Khan
10.flavor_text: "Jungle or forest, it doesn't matter. I'd recognize the scent of man anywhere."

10.name: Rama
10.text: PROTECTION OF THE PACK Whenever you play another character with 5 {S} or more, you may ready this character. If you do, he can't quest for the rest of this turn.
10.flavor_text: With cubs to protect, any strange sound must be investigated.

10.name: Mother Gothel
10.text: SOMEBODY'S GOT TO USE IT If a character was banished this turn, this character gets +2 {S}.
10.flavor_text: "The world is a cruel place, and sometimes you've got to be a little cruel to get by."

10.name: Katrina Van Tassel
10.flavor_text: She danced the night away, hoping to find someone who could keep up with her.

10.name: Hermes
10.text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)
10.flavor_text: "What do you mean, 'late'? Kid, I was ahead of my time before time was invented."

10.name: Beast
10.text:
Boost 2 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 2 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
THAT'S MINE Whenever he challenges another character, if there's a card under this character, each opponent loses 1 lore and you gain 1 lore.

10.name: Bronx
10.text:
Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)
STONE BY DAY If you have 3 or more cards in your hand, this character can't ready.

10.name: Tinker Bell
10.text:
Shift 3 {I} (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Tinker Bell.)
HARMLESS DIVERSION When you play this character, exert chosen opposing character with 2 {S} or less.

10.name: David Xanatos
10.text:
LEARN FROM EVERYTHING During your turn, whenever one of your characters is banished, draw a card.
WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR? Whenever this character quests, chosen character gains Rush this turn. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)

10.name: Hans
10.text:
JOSTLING FOR POWER King and Queen characters can't quest.
GROWING INFLUENCE At the start of your turn, if an opponent has 2 or more ready characters in play, gain 2 lore.

10.name: Hercules
10.text:
EVER VIGILANT This character can't be dealt damage unless he's being challenged.
EVER VALIANT While this character is exerted, your other Hero characters can't be dealt damage unless they're being challenged.

10.name: Goliath
10.text:
BE CAREFUL, ALL OF YOU Whenever one of your Gargoyle characters challenges another character, gain 1 lore.
STONE BY DAY If you have 3 or more cards in your hand, this character can't ready.

10.name: Brooklyn
10.text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
STONE BY DAY If you have 3 or more cards in your hand, this character can't ready.
10.flavor_text: "If they think we're beasts and monsters..."

10.name: Donald Duck
10.text:
HIGH ENERGY Your other Ruby characters get +1 {S}.
POWERFUL REWARD Your other Ruby characters with 7 {S} or more get +1 {L}.

10.name: Elisa Maza
10.text: SPECIAL DETAIL While you have 2 or more other characters in play with 5 {S} or more, this character gets +2 {L}.
10.flavor_text: "Now, you can let me look the place over, or I can come back with a warrant and a lot more cops. Your call."

10.name: Aladdin
10.text:
Boost 1 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 1 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)
ONLY THE BOLD While there's a card under this character, your characters with Reckless gain "{E} — Gain 1 lore."

10.name: Lady Tremaine
10.text:
Boost 2 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 2 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
EXPEDIENT SCHEMES Whenever this character quests, if you've put a card under her this turn, you may play an action with cost 5 or less from your discard for free, then put that action card on the bottom of your deck instead of into your discard.

10.name: The Headless Horseman
10.text:
LEAVES NO TRACE When you play this character, banish chosen opposing character with 2 {S} or less.
GATHERING STRENGTH During your turn, whenever an opposing character is banished, each of your characters gets +1 {S} this turn.

10.name: Mulan
10.text: FLOWING BLADE During your turn, if you've put a card under one of your characters or locations this turn, this character takes no damage from challenges.

10.name: Brom Bones
10.text: ROUGH AND TUMBLE Whenever this character challenges a character with 2 {S} or less, each opponent loses 1 lore.
10.flavor_text: "Hold on, schoolmaster! That's a mighty big book. Let me take that for you!"

10.name: Shere Khan
10.text:
Shift 5 {I} (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Shere Khan.)
WILD RAGE 1 {I}, Deal 1 damage to this character — Ready this character. He can't quest for the rest of this turn.

10.name: Next Stop, Olympus
10.text:
ACTION If you have a character with 5 {S} or more in play, you pay 2 {I} less to play this action.
Ready chosen character. They can't quest for the rest of this turn. The next time they challenge another character this turn, gain 1 lore.

10.name: Get to Safety!
10.text: Play a location with cost 3 or less from your discard for free. Then, if you have a location named Sleepy Hollow in play, draw a card.
10.flavor_text: Run scared if you must—but whatever you do, RUN!

10.name: Time to Go!
10.text: Banish chosen character of yours to draw 2 cards. If that character had a card under them, draw 3 cards instead.
10.flavor_text: "What are you doing here when there's a rogue horseman out there? Have you lost your head?" —Gaston

10.name: Ghostly Tale
10.text: Exert all opposing characters with 2 {S} or less.
10.flavor_text: Brom emphasized every frightful detail, determined to scare his rival.

10.name: Dragon Fire
10.text: Banish chosen character.
10.flavor_text: Never underestimate the wrath of a dragon.

10.name: Mushu's Rocket
10.text:
I NEED FIREPOWER When you play this item, chosen character gains Rush this turn. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)
HITCH A RIDE 2 {I}, Banish this item — Chosen character gains Rush this turn.

10.name: The Bitterwood
10.text: GATHER RESOURCES Once during your turn, whenever you move a character with 5 {S} or more here, you may draw a card.

10.name: Sleepy Hollow
10.text: HEAD FOR THE BRIDGE! Whenever a character quests while here, you may banish this location to gain 2 lore and give them Evasive until the start of your next turn. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)

10.name: Judy Hopps
10.text: HIDDEN CLUES When you play this character, if you have another Detective character in play, you may put chosen item into its player's inkwell facedown and exerted.
10.flavor_text: "More torn lorebook pages! Who could have done this?"

10.name: Hen Wen
10.text: FUTURE SIGHT Whenever this character quests, look at the top card of your deck. Put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.
10.flavor_text:
"She's a special pig, Taran."
—Dallben

10.name: Anna
10.text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
10.flavor_text: "Come on—there's tons to do! Skating and snow forts and sledding and hot chocolate!"

10.name: Chef Louis
10.flavor_text:
"When added to a clear soup, the pale, triple-pointed leaves of Trispiritus can have a restorative effect. CAUTION: DO NOT confuse it with Three Thorns, which causes itchy rashes."
—Hana's Herborium

10.name: Daisy Duck
10.text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
10.flavor_text: "If I'm reading this right, these aren't actually ghosts at all! Boy, you're lucky I came along on this one."

10.name: Cri-Kee
10.text: Alert (This character can challenge as if they had Evasive.)
10.flavor_text: "Small glimmers may feel safe in the jungle around the Mysterious Ruins, where they can easily go unnoticed." —Hana's Herborium

10.name: Rapunzel
10.text: ENSNARL When you play this character, chosen opposing character gets -3 {S} this turn.
10.flavor_text: "Well, that should slow you down for a minute."

10.name: Fergus McDuck
10.text: TOUGHEN UP When you play this character, chosen character of yours gains Ward until the start of your next turn. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)
10.flavor_text: "Ach, close the secret entrance! You're letting all the mysterious air out!"

10.name: Li Shang
10.flavor_text: The sound of hoofbeats filled the air. Li Shang moved his men into position, ready to turn the tables on their pursuer.

10.name: Genie
10.flavor_text: "You know, most books are a lot more compelling when you read the pages in order..."

10.name: Scuttle
10.text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
10.flavor_text: Whoa! The wind's all of a sudden on the move here.

10.name: Ichabod Crane
10.text: WELL-READ Whenever this character quests, if you've played a character with cost 5 or more this turn, put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

10.name: Jasmine
10.text:
Boost 2 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 2 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
UPLIFTING AURA Whenever this character quests, if there’s a card under her, remove up to 3 damage from each of your characters.

10.name: Judy Hopps
10.text:
Shift 4 {I} (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Judy Hopps.)
LATERAL THINKING During your turn, your Detective characters gain Alert and Resist +2. (They can challenge as if they had Evasive. Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)

10.name: The Sultan
10.flavor_text: Never mind what the Curator intended these trinkets for; the sultan found his own use for them soon enough.

10.name: Ichabod Crane
10.text: CHILLING TALE When this character is banished, you may put this card into your inkwell facedown and exerted.
10.flavor_text: "Every small detail in Brom's awful story returned to haunt his recollection." —Narrator

10.name: Scar
10.text:
Boost 2 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 2 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
SURVIVAL OF THE FITTEST Whenever you put a card under this character, chosen opposing character gets -5 {S} this turn.

10.name: Daisy Duck
10.text:
Shift 4 {I} (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Daisy Duck.)
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
STRANGE HAPPENINGS While this character is exerted, cards enter opponents' inkwells exerted.

10.name: Cinderella
10.text: WHATEVER YOU WISH FOR At the end of your turn, if you played a Princess character this turn, you may put a card from your hand into your inkwell facedown to draw a card.

10.name: Judy Hopps
10.text: THOROUGH INVESTIGATION When you play this character and whenever she quests, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Detective character card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

10.name: Pluto
10.text: ON THE TRAIL {E} — If you have a Detective character in play, return an item card from your discard to your hand. Otherwise, put it on the top of your deck.
10.flavor_text: Every detective can use an assistant to sniff out clues.

10.name: Daisy Duck
10.text:
STAND FAST Your other Sapphire characters gain Resist +1. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)
LOOK AHEAD Whenever one of your other Sapphire characters quests, you may look at the top card of your deck. Put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.

10.name: Kristoff
10.text:
Boost 1 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 1 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
WORTH MINING Whenever this character quests, if there's a card under him, put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

10.name: Mickey Mouse
10.text: GET A CLUE When you play this character, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.
10.flavor_text: The clues all pointed toward ghosts, but he knew there was something more going on here.

10.name: Hen Wen's Visions
10.text: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Put 1 on the top of your deck and the rest on the bottom in any order.
10.flavor_text:
"Hen Wen, from you I do beseech Knowledge that lies beyond my reach..."
—Taran

10.name: Promising Lead
10.text: Chosen character gets +1 {L} and gains Support this turn. (Whenever they quest, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
10.flavor_text: "The books on these pages match up with those shelves. And the ley lines... The answer's right here!" —Judy Hopps

10.name: Might Solve a Mystery
10.text:
(A character with cost 4 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal up to 1 character card and up to 1 item card and put them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

10.name: Sudden Scare
10.text: Put chosen opposing character into their player's inkwell facedown. That player puts the top card of their deck into their inkwell facedown.

10.name: Spooky Sight
10.text: Put all characters with cost 3 or less into their players' inkwells facedown and exerted.
10.flavor_text: "We've got to get out of here!" —Mickey Mouse

10.name: Detective's Badge
10.text: PROTECT AND SERVE {E}, 1 {I} — Chosen character gains Resist +1 and the Detective classification until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)
10.flavor_text: "It's not just a badge. It's who we are. There's no greater honor." — Detective Judy Hopps

10.name: Ink Amplifier
10.text: ENERGY CAPTURE Whenever an opponent draws a card during their turn, if it's the second card they've drawn this turn, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.
10.flavor_text: With a crackle of energy, the strange device lit up when the glimmers entered the study.

10.name: Fairy Godmother's Wand
10.text: ONLY TILL MIDNIGHT During your turn, whenever you put a card into your inkwell, chosen Princess character of yours gains Ward until the start of your next turn. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge.)
10.flavor_text: Sometimes a glimpse is all you need.

10.name: Inkrunner
10.text:
PREFLIGHT CHECK When you play this item, draw a card.
READY TO RIDE {E}, 1 {I} - Chosen character gains Alert this turn. (They can challenge as if they had Evasive.)

10.name: Castle of the Horned King
10.text: INTO THE GLOOM Once during your turn, whenever a character quests while here, you may ready chosen item.

10.name: Robin Hood
10.text:
Boost 1 {I} (Once during your turn, you may pay 1 {I} to put the top card of your deck facedown under this character.)
EXPERT SHOT Whenever this character quests, if there's a card under him, deal 1 damage to up to 2 chosen characters.

10.name: Donald Duck
10.text: RAISE A RUCKUS When you play this character, chosen Detective character gains Challenger +2 this turn. (They get +2 {S} while challenging.)
10.flavor_text: "Let's show those rotten ghosts who's in charge! You go first."

10.name: Goliath
10.text:
DUSK TO DAWN At the end of each player's turn, if they have more than 2 cards in their hand, they choose and discard cards until they have 2. If they have fewer than 2 cards in their hand, they draw until they have 2.

10.text: Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)

10.text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

10.name: Lexington
10.text:
Alert (This character can challenge as if they had Evasive.)
